00052 IFactoryInfo::KeyList TSingleFactory<Interface, Implementation>::GetFactoryKeys() const

00062 template <class Interface, class Implementation>
00063 Interface* TSingleFactory<Interface, Implementation>::CreateInstance(const std::string& keyId) const
00064 {
00065        if (keyId.empty() || (keyId == m_keyId)){

00067        }
00068 
00069        return NULL;
